LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_BaseSexEjectChance_Tip: The base chance that a predator will release prey in an appropriate sexual part during sex. This chance can be modified by quirks!
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_VaginalVoreAbortsPregna: Turning this on will cause any vaginal vore to terminate pregnancies, no matter how far progressed they are. The abortion will happen once the prey enters the womb.
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_PostSexProposalChance_T: The chance that the sex initiator proposes vore to the sex recipient
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_PostSexProposalsAreForc: Means the vore is done non-consensually and the acceptance chance is skipped
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_PostRapeProposalChance_: The chance that the rape initiator proposes vore to the raped pawn
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_PostRapeProposalsAreFor: Means the vore is done non-consensually and the acceptance chance is skipped
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_BestialityIsRape_Tip:
Turning this on will make all sex with animals lead to forced after-sex proposals.

RJW always flags bestiality as rape - which means post sex proposals would always be forced, RV-2 disables this logic by default.

Using this setting allows RV-2 to properly calculate proposal success chance based on the initiators animal handling skill instead of assuming forced proposals without partner consent.

This does not change how RJW treats rape or bestiality, merely how RV-2 evaluates if the proposal is forced or not!
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_Settings_DisableVoreGrappleDurin: Mostly relates to rape beating, turning this on will prevent rapists from vore-grappling their rape target.
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_PreySexEjectDescription: {GIVER} and {RECEIVER} had sex ({SEX}) while {GIVER} has prey {OLDVORETYPE} vored. {GIVER} ejected {PREY} due to orgasm.
LanguageData.RV2_RJW_PreySexTransferDescription: {GIVER} and {RECEIVER} had sex ({SEX}) while {GIVER} has prey {OLDVORETYPE} vored. {RECEIVER} is now {NEWVORETYPE} ({NEWVOREGOAL}) voring {PREY}.
